org.diirt.vtype.next

Class VNumberArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.vtype.next.VType
      • org.diirt.vtype.next.Array
        • org.diirt.vtype.next.VNumberArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VDoubleArray, VIntArray

    public abstract class VNumberArray
extends Array
    Numeric array with alarm, timestamp, display and control information.

    This class allows to use any numeric array (i.e. VIntArray or VDoubleArray) through the same interface.

    Author:
    carcassi
